title: The Sri Lankan editor trapped in his office for the last five years
content: Harith Eknaligoda holds a picture that includes his missing father, the Sri Lankan journalist Prageeth Eknaligoda News Source: The Independent – UK – By Andrew Buncombe New freedoms promised by the end of 25-year civil war are still being denied journalists in Sri Lanka, where many who have taken an unbiased stance have paid with…
